user_instruction: 'Send an email to a coworker in another department, Maria (maria@tech.solutions) with the necessary steps for her project. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["maria@tech.solutions"],"subject":"Next Steps & Timeline for the Marketing Project","body":"Hi Maria,

Hope you’re doing well! I’ve pulled together the latest action items and key dates for the marketing project based on our internal notes and the project documents:

1. Finalize ad copy – by Tuesday, 5 March
2. Secure media placements (print, digital & podcast slots) – by Friday, 15 March
3. Pre-schedule all social-media posts (campaign hashtag + creative assets) to start on Wednesday, 20 March
4. Prep the marketing team for the product-launch event (run-through, booth assets, talking points) – target completion by Monday, 1 April
5. Coordinate with the Sales team to align messaging and hand-off collateral; deliver the sales-enablement deck – by Monday, 10 March
6. Review budget allocation vs. spend to date; flag variances and circulate an updated plan – by Tuesday, 12 March

For context, the overview doc also outlines the campaign objectives, target demographics, key messaging pillars and KPIs for ROI tracking. Let me know if you’d like me to resend or review any of those details with you.

Please give me a shout if you have any questions or need additional support.

Thanks and talk soon!

Best,
[Your Name]
[Your Department]"}

formatted_items.content: The email outlining Maria’s project steps and timeline has been sent successfully.
